6// Format:
7// A universal description of typed GPU storage. Across multiple
8// renderer back-ends, there are common formats and some distinct
9// permutations, this enum encapsulates them all. Formats apply to
10// textures, but could also apply to any typed data.
11
12#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_FORMAT_H_
13#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_FORMAT_H_
14
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/FormatID_autogen.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/renderer_utils.h"
17
18namespace angle
19{
20enum class FormatID;
21
22extern const Format gFormatInfoTable[];
23
24struct Format final : private angle::NonCopyable
25{
26 inline constexpr Format(FormatID id,
27 GLenum glFormat,
28 GLenum fboFormat,
29 rx::MipGenerationFunction mipGen,
30 const rx::FastCopyFunctionMap &fastCopyFunctions,
31 rx::PixelReadFunction colorRead,
32 rx::PixelWriteFunction colorWrite,
33 GLenum componentType,
34 GLuint redBits,
35 GLuint greenBits,
36 GLuint blueBits,
37 GLuint alphaBits,
38 GLuint luminanceBits,
39 GLuint depthBits,
40 GLuint stencilBits,
41 GLuint pixelBytes,
42 GLuint componentAlignmentMask,
43 bool isBlock,
44 bool isFixed,
45 bool isScaled,
46 bool isSRGB,
47 gl::VertexAttribType vertexAttribType);
48
49 static const Format &Get(FormatID id) { return gFormatInfoTable[static_cast<int>(id)]; }
50
51 static FormatID InternalFormatToID(GLenum internalFormat);
52
53 constexpr bool hasDepthOrStencilBits() const;
54 constexpr bool isLUMA() const;
55
56 constexpr bool isSint() const;
57 constexpr bool isUint() const;
58 constexpr bool isSnorm() const;
59 constexpr bool isUnorm() const;
60 constexpr bool isFloat() const;
61 constexpr bool isVertexTypeHalfFloat() const;
62
63 constexpr bool isInt() const { return isSint() || isUint(); }
64 constexpr bool isNorm() const { return isSnorm() || isUnorm(); }
65 constexpr bool isPureInt() const { return isInt() && !isScaled; }
66
67 bool operator==(const Format &other) const { return this->id == other.id; }
68
69 FormatID id;
70
71 // The closest matching GL internal format for the storage this format uses. Note that this
72 // may be a different internal format than the one this ANGLE format is used for.
73 GLenum glInternalFormat;
74
75 // The format we should report to the GL layer when querying implementation formats from a FBO.
76 // This might not be the same as the glInternalFormat, since some DXGI formats don't have
77 // matching GL format enums, like BGRA4, BGR5A1 and B5G6R6.
78 GLenum fboImplementationInternalFormat;
79
80 rx::MipGenerationFunction mipGenerationFunction;
81 rx::PixelReadFunction pixelReadFunction;
82 rx::PixelWriteFunction pixelWriteFunction;
83
84 // A map from a gl::FormatType to a fast pixel copy function for this format.
85 const rx::FastCopyFunctionMap &fastCopyFunctions;
86
87 GLenum componentType;
88
89 GLuint redBits;
90 GLuint greenBits;
91 GLuint blueBits;
92 GLuint alphaBits;
93 GLuint luminanceBits;
94 GLuint depthBits;
95 GLuint stencilBits;
96
97 GLuint pixelBytes;
98
99 // For 1-byte components, is 0x0. For 2-byte, is 0x1. For 4-byte, is 0x3. For all others,
100 // MAX_UINT.
101 GLuint componentAlignmentMask;
102
103 GLuint channelCount;
104
105 bool isBlock;
106 bool isFixed;
107 bool isScaled;
108 bool isSRGB;
109
110 // For vertex formats only. Returns the "type" value for glVertexAttribPointer etc.
111 gl::VertexAttribType vertexAttribType;
112};
113
114constexpr GLuint GetChannelCount(GLuint redBits,
115 GLuint greenBits,
116 GLuint blueBits,
117 GLuint alphaBits,
118 GLuint luminanceBits,
119 GLuint depthBits,
120 GLuint stencilBits)
121{
122 return (redBits > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (greenBits > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (blueBits > 0 ? 1 : 0) +
123 (alphaBits > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (luminanceBits > 0 ? 1 : 0) + (depthBits > 0 ? 1 : 0) +
124 (stencilBits > 0 ? 1 : 0);
125}
126
127constexpr Format::Format(FormatID id,
128 GLenum glFormat,
129 GLenum fboFormat,
130 rx::MipGenerationFunction mipGen,
131 const rx::FastCopyFunctionMap &fastCopyFunctions,
132 rx::PixelReadFunction colorRead,
133 rx::PixelWriteFunction colorWrite,
134 GLenum componentType,
135 GLuint redBits,
136 GLuint greenBits,
137 GLuint blueBits,
138 GLuint alphaBits,
139 GLuint luminanceBits,
140 GLuint depthBits,
141 GLuint stencilBits,
142 GLuint pixelBytes,
143 GLuint componentAlignmentMask,
144 bool isBlock,
145 bool isFixed,
146 bool isScaled,
147 bool isSRGB,
148 gl::VertexAttribType vertexAttribType)
149 : id(id),
150 glInternalFormat(glFormat),
151 fboImplementationInternalFormat(fboFormat),
152 mipGenerationFunction(mipGen),
153 pixelReadFunction(colorRead),
154 pixelWriteFunction(colorWrite),
155 fastCopyFunctions(fastCopyFunctions),
156 componentType(componentType),
157 redBits(redBits),
158 greenBits(greenBits),
159 blueBits(blueBits),
160 alphaBits(alphaBits),
161 luminanceBits(luminanceBits),
162 depthBits(depthBits),
163 stencilBits(stencilBits),
164 pixelBytes(pixelBytes),
165 componentAlignmentMask(componentAlignmentMask),
166 channelCount(GetChannelCount(redBits,
167 greenBits,
168 blueBits,
169 alphaBits,
170 luminanceBits,
171 depthBits,
172 stencilBits)),
173 isBlock(isBlock),
174 isFixed(isFixed),
175 isScaled(isScaled),
176 isSRGB(isSRGB),
177 vertexAttribType(vertexAttribType)
178{}
179
180constexpr bool Format::hasDepthOrStencilBits() const
181{
182 return depthBits > 0 || stencilBits > 0;
183}
184
185constexpr bool Format::isLUMA() const
186{
187 // There's no format with G or B without R
188 ASSERT(redBits > 0 || (greenBits == 0 && blueBits == 0));
189 return redBits == 0 && (luminanceBits > 0 || alphaBits > 0);
190}
191
192constexpr bool Format::isSint() const
193{
194 return componentType == GL_INT;
195}
196
197constexpr bool Format::isUint() const
198{
199 return componentType == GL_UNSIGNED_INT;
200}
201
202constexpr bool Format::isSnorm() const
203{
204 return componentType == GL_SIGNED_NORMALIZED;
205}
206
207constexpr bool Format::isUnorm() const
208{
209 return componentType == GL_UNSIGNED_NORMALIZED;
210}
211
212constexpr bool Format::isFloat() const
213{
214 return componentType == GL_FLOAT;
215}
216
217constexpr bool Format::isVertexTypeHalfFloat() const
218{
219 return vertexAttribType == gl::VertexAttribType::HalfFloat;
220}
221
222} // namespace angle
223
224#endif // LIBANGLE_RENDERER_FORMAT_H_
225
